txt.en: Valdi is located in Amdân.\n\nBring the arrows to Valdi.
'Excellently done! Our army will be able to progress through the pass more safely now.'

'Archers are hindering our attack upon the ruins and Orc camp at the far end of the pass. They rain down arrows into the gorge from the overpass above. Thus far, they have repulsed our attempts to capture their position, for a company of dwarves presents a large target. A single dwarf, however, could get close enough without being seen to defeat them. Take them down from their perches, Hermáth, and relieve them of any weapons you might find.'
'Excellently done! Our army will be able to progress through the pass more safely now.'
Progress through Cloudyhead Pass is impeded by a dangerous hail of arrows, shot from enemies on the ledges above.
Archers can be found on the western overpass above the Cloudyhead Pass.\n\nYou should defeat archers and relieve them of their weapons.
